tutorial.title: Simple Medical Chat Tutorial
tutorial.description: A simplified introduction to our mobile medical consultation platform

slides.title: Welcome to MedChat
slides.text: Start by opening the MedChat app and tapping 'Start New Conversation' to begin your consultation.

media.altText: MedChat app home screen showing the Start New Conversation button

slides.title: Describe Your Symptoms
slides.text: Type your main concern clearly and specifically. The more details you provide, the better assistance you'll receive.

media.altText: Screenshot of symptom description interface with text input field

slides.title: Wait for Response
slides.text: Our healthcare professionals will review your information and provide guidance within minutes.

media.altText: Loading screen showing response is being prepared

slides.title: Review Recommendations
slides.text: Read through the healthcare professional's recommendations and follow-up questions carefully.

media.altText: Screen showing healthcare professional's recommendations and advice

slides.title: Follow Up if Needed
slides.text: You can ask follow-up questions or start a new conversation anytime through the app.

media.altText: Follow-up options screen with new conversation and additional questions buttons
